description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In WORDZY, you can play on your own or compete against another to complete a 5-letter word with letter clues.  Customize your game with three different difficulty levels.  Great fun for the whole family to expand vocabulary and spelling skills!
